definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
travel insurance covering flight delay, baggage loss etc (abbr. for 旅遊不便險|旅游不便险)
unable to move freely/difficult to get about

sentences.english: Please accept our company's  deep apology for this.
sentences.chinese: 請接受敝公司對此事所造成之不便的深深歉意。

sentences.english: We are sorry that you have been inconvenienced.
sentences.chinese: 給你造成不便，真是對不起。

sentences.english: I'm terribly sorry for the inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 對於給您帶來的不便，我深感抱歉。

sentences.english: Sorry for your inconvenience and thank you for your patience. GOMTV.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉我們所帶來的不便，謝謝大家的耐心和支持。

sentences.english: The utility model is especially suitable for a cultivation-free novel agricultural plowing method, etc. with inconvenience in top-dressing.
sentences.chinese: 它特別適用於免中耕等不便追肥的農業新耕法。

sentences.english: Deliver Thanksgiving dinners to housebound people.
sentences.chinese: 給行動不便的人們送上感恩大餐。

sentences.english: We apologize for inconveniencing you in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我們對給你帶來這樣的不便表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are many inconveniences that you have to put up with when you are camping.
sentences.chinese: 你在露營時必須克服許多不便。

sentences.english: I’m sorry to have caused you so much inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 給您造成諸多不便，我很抱歉。

sentences.english: Hopefully in the future, these little inconveniences will be solved.
sentences.chinese: 希望以後，這些小的不便可以被解決掉。

sentences.english: Cluttered or disorganized apps are difficult to understand and hard to use.
sentences.chinese: 雜亂或無組織的應用程序既難以理解又不便使用。

sentences.english: We must modify the circuit diagram unless it is easy for the parts of the circuit to be adjusted and tested .
sentences.chinese: 如果線路中各部件不便調試，我們必須修改線路圖。

sentences.english: Sorry for this and thanks for your action.
sentences.chinese: 對此不便我深感抱歉，同時非常感謝你行動。

sentences.english: He overweights himself with huge muscles.
sentences.chinese: 他肥胖的身軀令他行動不便。

sentences.english: Think of the inconveniences of living in such a small house with a large family.
sentences.chinese: 想想一大家人住在這樣小的房子裏的不便之處。

sentences.english: Because Laoqiang had a little difficulty walking, so we let him wait for us in the same place.
sentences.chinese: 因爲失主行走有點兒不便，我們讓他在原地等着我們。

definition: convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
to go out somewhere (relatively short trip)/to set off on a journey (longer trip)
in order to avoid/so as not to
to cause trouble for sb/to inconvenience
